author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36938#issuecomment-1128887595 demonstrated a case where a SwitchProducer was in a ConditionalTask, and SwitchProducer's non-chosen EDAlias case was consumed explicitly by a module in the same ConditionalTask/Path, and the alias-for EDModule was left unscheduled. This PR fixes the behavior to be such that the alias-for EDModule gets inserted into the Path.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests in `FWCore/Integration` succeed. The test case https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36938#issuecomment-1128887595 works now as expected.
title: Fix behavior of SwitchProducer in ConditionalTask with non-chosen EDAlias case(s) that are consumed explicitly
